applicationTimeline.applyBefore: 6 months prior to the course start date

durationOfStay.maximumDuration: Up to 5 years with Tier 4 student visa
durationOfStay.travelPeriod: Up to one month before the course duration for courses longer than 6 months

steps: Access the online application form through the UK Visa and Immigration website.
Fill out the complete application and fee payment details.
After submitting the application, wait for the decision as supporting documents need to be verified.
Subsequent to this, the applicant’s photograph and fingerprints (biometric verification) are taken at the center.
